AFSCME. Local 1306 (American Museum of Natural History) (New York, N.Y.)
AFSCME. Local 1306 (American Museum of Natural History) (New York, N.Y.)
AFSCME. Local 1306 (American Museum of Natural History) (New York, N.Y.)
circa 1980s-2000s

This very small collection contains some records of the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), DC 37, Local 1306, which represented workers in the American Museum of Natural History. The collection contains correspondence, collective bargaining documents, grievances, and minutes of the local.

Donated by Reggie Qadar, Local 1306 president, on behalf of the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1306, in 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 1979.003.
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
